channel.title: Irc Court!
channel.description:
We held a court thing on irc because Mebejames Evaded the ban on gay*!* So we took it to court Thug-life-tbh = me tbh
I SAY GUILTY ya U R GUILTY WAIT ORDA U FAIL U R GURILT BAN THAT NIG MebeJames was found guilty of evading a ban on gay*!* I NEED A LAWYER Officers, please take him away. WHO CAN BE MY LAWYER ur anus lul <|Yz85Racer|> Moi I WILL NO WAIT DA COURT HAS NOT FINISHED <|Yz85Racer|> Moi] 0.9% left ok yz u r my lawyer on dis game  I WILL BE YOUR COURT SO YOU DIES KAMU R U HERE if someone get me a online play CD key for BF2 <|Yz85Racer|> KAMOO I will love much  xerxes it is impossibles y unless you play on old server i mean patch y iz it impossibles den it is easily possibles cnt u hax patch coz dey ban all gays keys* dat r suspicious <|Yz85Racer|> lol dat lots of ppl use y da fug did i waste getting dis gaem den fug. u play on old patch still same fing myb i hax patch myb and u can play on single playa ya OEK WE NEED KAMU ORDER IN DA COART order I got a BF 1942 Key pls yep? <|Yz85Racer|> STFU Kamu current case: y MebeJames evaded ban on gay*!* <|Yz85Racer|> were in court OK KAMU Ur a jury dood WE R IN COART NOBODY BE GAY OK? now i sit next case: wut shud xerxes_ do for bf2 online play  MebeJames sits Me is a Jury <|Yz85Racer|> lol kamu decides jury kamu who is da jurys NOLOL <|Yz85Racer|> me is mebes lawyer  HexKey (n=email@ACCF1C1B.ipt.aol.com) has joined #mopar yah Me and Thug are the Jury Thug-life-tbh can be da offical farter guy der ME AND BOB BE JURY SO WE CAN HAV SECKS hexkey is jury And HexKey ok, will the prosection please present their opening statement, mr. xerxes_ who farts in da court room YEZ SO K W R HER TUDAY <|Yz85Racer|> LOL] ok whos on trial? me  MebeJames TO SEE Y MISS MebeJames EVADED A BAN, for what? ORDER IN COURT He evaded a ban on Gay!@! LIEK WE BANT gay*!* BUT HE STIL HERE, WTF?!?!? ORDER <|Yz85Racer|> lol wooo ok proceed +m ye I AM FINISHT do +m UrjurywivmeandThug !11111 voice me plz * ChanServ gives channel operator status to Kamu o fug * Kamu sets mode +m #mopar * Kamu gives voice to xerxes_ ya prosecutor yez sur * Kamu gives voice to MebeJames hlo defendant iz gay lul yz needs +v coz he lawyer who is his defense atorney hahaha * #mopar :Cannot send to channel yz85racer have you nominated a defence lawyer MebeJames ? YES >#mopar< roffels yz85racer * Kamu gives voice to |Yz85Racer| <|Yz85Racer|> hlo I shall be judge and  Thug-life-tbh jury needs voice!! * #mopar :Cannot send to channel * Kamu gives voice to Bob_Lablah da offical farter: Thug-life-tbh he farts hexkey be jury in da court rum is jury <|Yz85Racer|> LOL I am Jury bob is biast ur honur how so MebeJames ?  Bob_Lablah sits down in the Jury stand ur honur i seek permission to fart on MebeJames <|Yz85Racer|> LOL >#mopar< i cant fart if no one can hear me liek wtf overruled no farting till after court i seek permission for hexkey to be da jury o k sry * Kamu gives voice to HexKey hexkey be juror 2 plz GUILTY.. PWNT >#mopar< but me hex and bob are liek jury <|Yz85Racer|> lol nonononono Your most honourabe Mr.Kamu luL OK THANK YOU, ORDER court finihsed jk xerxes_, opening statement please k so liek we bant gay*!* yet dis niga named MebeJames still here therefore he evaded ban liek wtf?????? Ah! hmmm! hahah * #mopar :Cannot send to channel DIS IS A THREAT TO DEMOCRACY ok, please call your first witness, xerxes_ Thug-life-tbh  * #mopar :Cannot send to channel rofl * Kamu gives voice to Thug-life-tbh RIGHT FIRST you may begin your testimony U BANT GAY THEN I FELT A TICKLE ON MY ANUS lUl wtf AND SAW IT WAS MebeJames  HexKey streaks across court room OBJECTION SO LIEK HE EVADED BAN SO GET HIM LIEK NOW  Thug-life-tbh farts WILL THE DEFENDANT BE QUIET, OR BE CHARGED IN CONTEMPT OF COURT <|Yz85Racer|> objection ksoz ok, |Yz85Racer| you may now cross-examin the witness YEAH SO HE TOUCHED MY ANUS <|Yz85Racer|> How could that be true your honur? As this tape displays, Mr. Sir Xerexs IS the person who is gay, as we can see, constantly talking about anuzes, perticulary mens. objection <|Yz85Racer|> lol I accept the tape into evidence. when i talk about anuzes i mean u nigga U WNA FIGHT  Thug-life-tbh farts  Thug-life-tbh farts  Bob_Lablah whispers to the most great honourable Kamu " Can I get a new person for Jury, HexKey is stroking my leg " hh Ah!!  HAH It appears xerxes_ does talk of anusses time to shout guilty yet?? yo wtf!1111 xerxes_, explain yourself  Bob_Lablah also hints, " my third leg " YOU ARE BOUGHT BY THEM I DEMAND A NEW TRIAL BAN DIS FOOL HE WAS BANNED BUT STILL TICKLED MY ANUS LIEK WTF ITS LIEK MebeJames ya! <|Yz85Racer|> If I may add, Xerxes also tried to Rape my client, MebeJames ORDER!!! o NOULIELOL do you have proof of this |Yz85Racer| ? He framed me for homosexuality <|Yz85Racer|> Yes Us the Jury shall decide on the case great honourable Kamu ? u r ghey end of <|Yz85Racer|> If I may request a second to find the line Your Honur certainly. yeah ley me shout guilty alreayd, i need to get some food and sex  Thug-life-tbh gets bored Secks me Hex  Thug-life-tbh pulls out his thing <|Yz85Racer|> gimmi anus secks MebeJames  Thug-life-tbh sees MebeJames light up and run over wtf!! LIEK FRAMED BAN HIM NOW OBJECTION My! OBJECTION !!1!1! OBJECTION xerxes_, you have to follow up objection with a statement o Great honourable Judge Kamu, can I ask the defendant a few questions ? sry i just srated this law stuff 1) another witness: frunk  Thug-life-tbh walks away yes, Bob_Lablah may ask the defendant questions <|Yz85Racer|> lol 2) that text is framed!!!!! 1) i nvr say gimmi jury brobing!!! Okay [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 2) i never say escks [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 ty [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 [12:52] say im innocent u get $100 OMG!!!!!! WTF BAN KEKEK DIS IS HARDCORE PROOP PROOF* NO PROOP LELE * Kamu removes voice from Thug-life-tbh SEEMS LIEK D GULITY IS FOUND MebeJames, you are accused of Ban Evading this day, there was a ban on gay!*! and you where still there, how so ? JUDGE TALKS NOT U 2 Witnesses, and 1 still haven't been able to talk. <|Yz85Racer|> Bob I have given permission for Bob_Lablah to question! Thank you Judge Kamu. ANSWER THE QUESTION MebeJames ! MebeJames, do you admit your a homosexual ? <|Yz85Racer|> Kamu, sir, may I also put my imput to the answers honorable sir? NO I do have to remind you, your under oth to tell the truth |Yz85Racer|, you may object when feel necessary, but you must provide a reason for objecting to the questioning YES, NO Therefor, you can be convicted this moment for lieing about your orientation You don't have a squat of proof Judge Kamu, can I find the line ? Yes. Your honour, may we also take into account the fact that "gay" does not neccasarily mean "homosexual" purjory.. lying in sourt!! your all guilty * Kamu removes voice from HexKey I hear by declare, I'm homosexual <|Yz85Racer|> LOL I WILL NOT TOLERATE YOUR OUTBURSTS (MebeJames) hey can i touch your anus xerxes_ !!! !!! MebeJames, did you say this? no your honour <|Yz85Racer|> Objection wut <|Yz85Racer|> It is <> u r my lawyer <|Yz85Racer|> Not <|Yz85Racer|> () !!! OH PWNT <|Yz85Racer|> Proof he is lieing your honour xerxes_, ARE YOU PROVIDING THE COURT WITH FAKE EVIDENCE?! Yes you did, you said you were homosexual, and you also tried stroking Thug-life's anus <|Yz85Racer|> Objection How dare you lie in court, under oth, it's outrageous <|Yz85Racer|> James, MebeJames, very rarely talks in capital I's and such. this is ture
We will be holding more court cases in #courtroom :) lolol

item.title: Irc Court!
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

* Now talking in #courtroom Oman * Thug-life-tbh has joined #courtroom ohlo I shall be the judge ? WUTS NEXT TRIAL AND THUG LIFE IS ON TRIAL i am judge FOR SELLING MY BABIES FOR CRACK AWP ME * Kamu has joined #courtroom * |Yz85Racer| has joined #courtroom * MebeJames sets mode: +o Kamu * MebeJames sets mode: -o MebeJames xerxes needs 2 be her i am prosecutor okie dokes prepare you case http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,127276.0.html Great honourable Judge(s) I stand here before you today, to bring upon you the fact, that Thug-life-tbh, hath solt my babies for crack cocaine FKING LIEK NO witness + evidence, and once we apprehend the defendant we shall begin NORLY?!LOL the defendant has skipped trial sir <|Yz85Racer|> Honourable Judge Jamu <|Yz85Racer|> Kamu guilty imo. Kamu, may I hath a second to get my witness on IRC <|Yz85Racer|> I would like <|Yz85Racer|> a case of xerxes sexually arrasing verbally? <|Yz85Racer|> Thug-life sorry U R GHEY TBHNOULIELOL <|Yz85Racer|> oi Free <|Yz85Racer|> you missed heaps of the trial i know i closed to window by accident yZ85 We shall Prosecute MebeJames ! BAN HIN LLELEEL wtf for Been ghey and touching my anus and thats bobs job not urs tbh Yes, we are standing you on trial for sexually harasing him, and this could go to Rape * davidude36 has joined #courtroom sapnin I call my first witness to the stand ohlo Thug-life-tbh what no you cant ORDER THE JUDGE NEEDS 2 BE HERE ORDER YA I CAN who is teh judge? LELLE E ELEL kamu I AM WITNESS ORDER KEKE ORDER I ORDERD YOU MUM SHE NEVER CAME LEIK I PAID FOR DAT ok it seems prosecutor Bob_Lablah has an opening statement Yes.\ Please make your statement. <|Yz85Racer|> MebeJames, am I your Lawyer again? SEXLOL yes plz kamu, +m ANY INTERUPTIONS WILL RESULT IN REMOVAL FROM THE COURTROOM, DO I MAKE MYSELF CLEAR?! <|Yz85Racer|> k <|Yz85Racer|> no <|Yz85Racer|> yes <|Yz85Racer|> jk NOULIELOL <|Yz85Racer|> :P just +m it * Kamu sets mode: +i * Thug-life-tbh sets mode +m #courtroom <|Yz85Racer|> i? We stand here today, to put MebeJames on trial, he is accused of sexual harrasment, and in the most extreme case, minor rape MINOR?? HE SECKS MY ANUS Has MebeJames decided on a defence atorney? <|Yz85Racer|> lul Yes, yz85racer Will Bob_Lablah please present his case. NOLOL Your great honourable Judge Kamu, may I draw your attention, to Evidence 1 ( Thug-life-tbh's anal hole ) rofl It is red, which is proof dat it as been secksed * Thug-life-tbh pulls out anus I see, clearly ripped, too. hurts i want compensation Now, may I point out, that you yourself were witness to the outbursts in the previous case ( the IRC Vrs MebeJames in the case of Ban evasion ) yeah he touched my thang tbh I was indeed. iSKIP court lerl * MebeJames has left #courtroom Where, Thug-life, was constantly been harassed by MebeJames tickling his anus FK from paris to berlin and every disco i been in <|Yz85Racer|> Your loyal and humble Honour, Judge Sir Kamu, How can my client be accused of Rape, when he clearly is not so good himself? <|Yz85Racer|> I ORDERD YOU MUM SHE NEVER CAME <|Yz85Racer|> LEIK I PAID FOR DAT <|Yz85Racer|> And compensation Now, you great honourable Judge Kamu, does that look like an innocent man there ? Skipping court when faced with evidence ? <|Yz85Racer|> being when you are injured and cannot work. May I ask how the defendant was able to tickle Thug-life-tbh's anus from the defendants chair? I HAD A HOLE IN MY CHAIR AND MY PANTS The chairs are a good 10 feet apart! Do you remember when Thug-life was called to the stand ? HE RAN OVER Yes. He had to walk past MebeJames I see! At that moment he tickled his anus And, he hath now jumped court ? When faced with evidence that doesn't look good on him ? wHAT HE SAID|^|^ * davidude36 is the person who paints pictures of the courtroom I see I prepose for a 2 minute recess where I can talk with the defendants lawyer about a deal * Lothy` has joined #courtroom * davidude36 has painted the anus tickling incident. o yes Granted Thank you. Court is in recess FK YEASH hai judge Kamu <4 * Thug-life-tbh starts to wank who wants to play tetherball with me/ * Kamu has quit IRC ("Leaving") FK <|Yz85Racer|> srry guys <|Yz85Racer|> i seriously g2g FK all /part * Thug-life-tbh has left #courtroom ("Leaving") * |Yz85Racer| has quit IRC
